Mod.Name: Rebirth Flame Plus (Character Textures)
Mod.Author: Fated Courage + Slimebucket
Mod.Description:
Rebirth Flame Plus Version 1.8 now out - Rinow Eye fix and Kid Squall added
Replaces playable character textures. 8x size of orignal textures ~ 1024x1024
Includes main texture pack, and both Mago and Devina version of Squall, Rinoa and Quistis.
Original mod Flame Rebirth 1.3 by Fated Courage J8 port, and extra texture work, eye fix by Slimebucket

LatestVersion.ReleaseNotes: v1.8 - minor fixes - Rinoa - Kid Squall v1.7 - minor fixes - Quistis v1.6 - minor fixes - RInoa Selphie v1.5 - More eye fixes, Rinoa, Squall and Laguna v1.4 - Many texture fixes, more eye fixes v1.3 - First release
